00046 /*! The DataSetHeader information container class. */
00047 class DataSetHeader
00048 {
00049 public:
00050 
00051         DataSetHeader();
00052         ~DataSetHeader();
00053 
00054 private:
00055 
00056         /*! total rows in the data set */
00057         int32_t rowCount;
00058         /*! data data set name */
00059         std::wstring name;
00060         /*! name/value pairs */
00061         ParameterNameValueTypeVector nameValParams;
00062         /*! column information */
00063         ColInfoVector columnTypes;
00064         /*! file position of the start of the dataSet header */
00065         u_int32_t headerStartFilePos;
00066         /*! file position of the start of the data */
00067         u_int32_t dataStartFilePos;
00068         /*! file position of the next dataSet header */
00069         u_int32_t nextSetFilePos;
00070

00074         void Clear();

00092 
00093         void GetNameValIterators(ParameterNameValueTypeIt &begin, ParameterNameValueTypeIt &end);
00094         /*! Finds a ParameterNameValueType by name in the nameValPairs collection
00095          *      @param name The name of the NameValPair to find
00096          *      @param result Reference to a ParameterNameValueType to fill with the found ParameterNameValueType.
00097          *      @return true if the ParameterNameValueType was found
00098          */
00099         bool FindNameValParam(const std::wstring& name, ParameterNameValueType& result) const;

00134 
00135         /*! Set the file position of the start of the DataSet header.
00136          *      The value set here is not written to the file.
00137          */
00138         void SetHeaderStartFilePos(u_int32_t pos) { headerStartFilePos = pos; }
00139         /*! Get the file position of the start of the DataSet header. */
00140         u_int32_t GetHeaderStartFilePos() const { return headerStartFilePos; }
00141 
00142         /*! Set the file position of the start of the DataSet data.
00143         *  The value set here is not written to the file.
00144         */
00145         void SetDataStartFilePos(u_int32_t pos) { dataStartFilePos  = pos; }
00146         /*! Get the file position of the start of the DataSet data. */
00147         u_int32_t GetDataStartFilePos() const { return dataStartFilePos; }
00148 
00149         /*! Set the file position of the next DataSet header. */
00150         void SetNextSetFilePos(u_int32_t pos) { nextSetFilePos = pos; }
00151         /*! Get the file position of the next DataSet header. */
00152         u_int32_t GetNextSetFilePos() const { return nextSetFilePos; }
00153 
00154 protected:
00155         /*! Finds a ParameterNameValueType by name in the nameValPairs collection
00156          *      @param p The ParameterNameValueType to find
00157          *      @return An iterator referencing the NameValPair if it exists, otherwise it returns nameValPairs.end()
00158          */
00159         ParameterNameValueTypeConstIt FindNameValParam(const ParameterNameValueType& p) const;

00162 
00163 };
